text: The 1990 World Junior Curling Championships were held from March 18 to 24 in Portage la Prairie, Manitoba, Canada. It was the first World Junior Championships to include teams from Finland. ==Men== ===Teams=== {| class=wikitable |- ! Country !! Skip !! Third !! Second !! Lead !!
